ygData.subject: RE: Binding or not...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Every time the song pulses, it moves you slightly higher, up to a point.  I suspect a caster could accomplish the same thing by recasting levitate over and
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 4 Oct 1999, Mike Roach wrote:
>
> Oooh, I need some clarification on this phrase:
>
> "Only a bard with levitate can make it up there. (since our levitate
> continues to make you rise up)"
>
> I am still a few levels away from the Aria of Eagles but am I to understand
> that you do not remain hovering at the approximate 6 foot level off the
> ground that you do when levitated by the magician's spell form? I would
> like to understand the workings of this song if anyone can elaborate.

Every time the song pulses, it moves you slightly higher, up
to a point. I suspect a caster could accomplish the same
thing by recasting levitate over and over.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
